summary: This document appears to be a single page from grand jury material listing charges against Jeffrey Epstein related to enticing minors for prostitution and travel for illicit sexual conduct. It references a confidential witness, Jane Doe #2, and details multiple counts with specific dates in early 2005.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The defendant facing multiple grand jury charges for conspiracy to entice a minor to engage in prostitution, enticement, travel to engage in illicit sexual conduct, and attempted enticement.

events.title: Epstein charged with enticement of a minor
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein is charged with enticement of a minor to engage in prostitution (Count 6).

events.title: Multiple conspiracy charges filed against Epstein
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein faces three separate counts (O.A. 95, 96, 97) for conspiracy to entice a minor to engage in prostitution.

events.title: Epstein charged with attempted enticement
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein is charged with attempted enticement of a minor to engage in prostitution (Count 60).

events.title: Epstein charged with travel for illicit sex and conspiracy
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein is charged with travel to engage in illicit sexual conduct (Count 43) and conspiracy to entice a minor (O.A. 122).

events.title: Epstein charged with conspiracy
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein is charged with conspiracy to entice a minor to engage in prostitution (O.A. 123).

keyFacts: The document lists multiple grand jury charges against Jeffrey Epstein from February to April 2005.
Charges include conspiracy to entice a minor to engage in prostitution, enticement, travel to engage in illicit sexual conduct, and attempted enticement.
The document references a confidential witness identified as 'JANE DOE #2' and is marked as confidential grand jury material.
The charges span specific dates in early 2005, indicating a pattern of alleged criminal activity during that period.
